overview:
1to1Tutor.orghas been a pioneer in online tutoring since 2005 and has worked with over 500 school districts. We have a very easy to use, step-by-step process for you to get started from the comfort of your home at whatever time is most convenient for you. We offer a free session for those not familiar with online tutoring and a subsequent risk-free demonstration session. Once you are completely comfortable and satisfied you can register online and choose an appropriate program as per your need and budget. We offer you the most competitive prices for all our online programs.

1to1Tutor.orgemploys full time teachers who are highly skilled in their respective subjects. They are very well trained and work with students of all strengths to make sure that every childâ€™s needs can be met. We also use state-of-the-art technology in our tutoring programs, including our interactive Whiteboard tool where students can instantly write and exchange formulas on their computer with a light pen, interactive chat rooms, and an email and message board. You can schedule your time to learn and offer our services 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
